name: role of the dice (G E B)
name_original: role of the dice (G E B)
description:
You once had the role of the king of dice,  but now you fell from the throne and have to climb all the way up again! 

This game contains:

a lot of very preciise plataforming 

around 5 minutes of gameplay

a very exciting ending

a secret room and skin themed around another dev who is a friend of mine
